updates.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman reveals the company is generating 'well more' than $13 billion in annual revenue, addressing investor concerns about massive AI infrastructure spending and path to profitability.

Meta faces mounting Wall Street pressure over AI spending as investors question the company's massive infrastructure investments without clear product-market fit, highlighting broader industry concerns about AI ROI.

Y Combinator alum Adam raises $4.1M seed round to transform its viral text-to-3D generation tool into an AI copilot for creators, after generating over 10 million social media impressions with its initial launch.

Perplexity AI strikes multi-year licensing deal with Getty Images, legitimizing its use of stock photos and addressing previous plagiarism accusations while setting precedent for AI companies' content partnerships.

Apple CEO Tim Cook announces the company is open to AI-focused mergers and acquisitions while preparing to announce more AI partnerships beyond its current OpenAI integration for Siri and Apple Intelligence.
